QueryText: farmer want to know Bacterial canker control in mango
KccAns: Bacterial canker control in mango -Follow common cultural mechanical and biological practicesCultural control:Regular inspection of orchards sanitation and seedling certification are recommended as preventive measuresMango stones for raising seedlings root stock should always be taken from healthy fruitsUse of wind-breaks helps in reducing brushing wounding and thus reduces chance of infection

QueryText: Bacterial canker disease in mango plants
KccAns: spray Copper Oxychloride 50 WP 25 gramliter of water

QueryText: Regarding Bacterial canker in mangosymptom Minute dark greenwater soaked areas appear on leaves and fruitsLaterthese spots become raisedThe disease spread is rapid during rains and becomes severe in july -august
Bacterial Canker Disease control in Mango Plants
Asking about Bacterial canker management in mango

KccAns: 600     200         RECOMMENDED  TO SPRAY STREPTOCYCLINE   20 GRAM   200 LITRES OF WATER ACRE    20   200

QueryText: Asking about the control for bacterial canker in mango
KccAns: Suggested to spray streptocycline 1gm10 lit of water or copper oxychloride blitox  2gmlit of water or carbendazin 2gmlit of water at 10 days of intervals

QueryText: Information about control of bacterial canker
Asked about the management of Bacterial Canker in Mango
KccAns: Once the disease is noticed at 10 days intervals and monthly sprays of Bordeaux mixture 1 or Copper oxychloride 50 WP 3 gramlitre of water or Carbendazim 50 WP 1 gramlitre of water are effective in controlling the disease
